## StatusBarBuilderOptions.third property

Color configuration for the third column.

**Signature:**

```typescript
third: {
        foreground: ColorInput;
        background: ColorInput;
    };
```

## Remarks

The third column is right-aligned and does not truncate. Typically used for brief status indicators or counts.
